Hi,team
Hi there! How can I assist you today?
do you accept MMP Links only?
We do accept MMP links for tracking purposes. If you have any specific questions about integrating your MMP links, feel free to ask!
MMP links only?
Yes, we accept MMP links only for tracking purposes. If you need help with the integration process, please let me know!
https://business.newsbreak.com/tracking/attribute?callback=xxx&event_type=conversion_event

It looks like you're trying to set up a tracking link. If you need help with integrating your MMP link, please provide more details about the platform you're using, and I can guide you through the process.
Is this one your global postback?

Yes, the URL you provided is a template for our global postback. You can use it to track conversions by replacing the placeholders with your specific parameters. If you need detailed instructions for a specific platform, please let me know!
for billing,do you accept credit/debit cards only?
For billing, we accept credit and debit cards. If you have any other questions about payment methods or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
do you accept paynoeer?
Currently, we only accept credit and debit cards for billing. We do not accept Payoneer at this time. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, please let me know!
Is there any credit amount?

Yes, we do offer ad credits as a promotional form of payment for ads on NewsBreak. If you've received an ad credit and need to know how to redeem it, you can find detailed instructions in our FAQ guide. If you have any specific questions about your ad credit, feel free to ask!
where is the FAQ guide?

You can find the FAQ guide on how to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit here: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). If you have any other questions, feel free to ask!
Do you support Pure CPA?

Currently, NewsBreak supports various ad formats and billing options, but we do not specifically support Pure CPA (Cost Per Action) campaigns. If you have any other questions or need further details about our advertising options, feel free to ask!
How will i be charged?CPC?CPM?

On NewsBreak, you can be charged based on CPC (Cost Per Click) or CPM (Cost Per Mille). You can choose the billing method that best suits your campaign goals. If you need more details on how these billing methods work, feel free to ask!
good day
Good day! How can I assist you today?
with the bidding type of Max Conversion Value Bidding and Target ROAS,it's still CPC/CPM basis,right?

Yes, even with bidding strategies like Max Conversion Value Bidding and Target ROAS, the charges are still based on CPC (Cost Per Click) or CPM (Cost Per Mille). These strategies help optimize your bids to achieve the best results within your specified budget. If you need more details on how these bidding strategies work, feel free to ask!
how these bidding strategies work?

Sure! Here's a brief overview of how these bidding strategies work:
1. **Max Conversion Value Bidding**: This strategy automatically optimizes and tailors bids for your ads to get the highest conversion value within your specified daily budget. It aims to maximize the total value of conversions rather than just the number of conversions.
2. **Target ROAS (Return on Ad Spend)**: This strategy allows you to set a target return on ad spend, and our Ad Manager will adjust your bids to achieve that target. It focuses on delivering conversions that meet your specific ROAS goal.
Both strategies utilize AI and machine learning to optimize performance and require the integration of a pixel/postback for tracking conversions.
For more detailed information, you can refer to our FAQ guide here: [How to choose a bidding strategy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/21344263367053-How-to-choose-a-bidding-strategy). If you have any other questions, feel free to ask!
